turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Have you ever heard of "Save the Children"? It an agency that helps children in underdeveloped and developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No, I actually haven't . Do you have any more information about the organization that you could tell me?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: it is not sponsored or supported by any governmental agencies and it helps children abroad and within the US. You would be shocked at how many children live in poverty here in the United States.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have an idea. Whats a more specific idea of what you do? How do you help? Whats their overall goal?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, a very specific goal right is to help the children that are separated from their parents due to our current immigration problem. Can you imagine someone taking your small child away from you and not knowing where they are going, who is going to be caring for them, or if you will ever be able to see them again? As a mother, that thought is horrifying.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It is horrifying, I could not even imagine. What do you need me to do?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children has committed to providing some of the care and needs for these children until they can be reunited with their parents. Would you be willing to donate your pay for this task to Save the Children so they can continue to provide care for these misplaced children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: My pay? As in my weekly paycheck? Or are there any other payment options, as I have bills to pay.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: No, but you could donate part of your pay for this particular task here. Say, maybe half of your payment for this task or even the whole thing?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I will happily donate my whole payment for this task. :)

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you! Save the Children is a very reputable charity and your donation will mean so much!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am so grateful there is a way for me to help financially!!!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It really is a great charity and has been around for over 100 years! And while the current immigration crisis is a relatively new problem, they stand ready to help in whatever capacity they can.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That is fantastic to hear!!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It has been a pleasure chatting with you and donating your task pay to this fine cause should get you some good Karma for the remainder of your day!!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you! You will as well for all the hard work you're putting towards this magnificent charity.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You are quite welcome!!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You can send me the information with the email you have on file for me. :)

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: ok, I will get it out to as soon as possible!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you so much for your time and the effort you are putting towards this very reputable charity!!
